metadata.name: Apollo
metadata.description:
Golden locks cascade from the heavens, framing a countenance that radiates warmth and light. The deity's aura shimmers with the brilliance of a thousand suns, a celestial symphony of power and grace. In wake, trail of stardust glimmers like ethereal tapestry, masterpiece woven by hand of god. Apollo, archer of light, harbinger of truth, patron of arts - deity beyond measure, celestial being of infinite power and beauty.

You have the right to use, distribute and display the creation for non-commercial purposes. You can resell with the same rights as they are for collecting and trading only. Commercial rights can be acquired by contacting AUXAPEX. All artworks are verified by the blockchain.
